panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: gitlab-shell Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="gitlab-shell"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{type="gitlab-shell"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="gitlab-shell"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{type="gitlab-shell"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{type="gitlab-shell"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: gitlab-shell Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="gitlab-shell"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{type="gitlab-shell"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="gitlab-shell"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{type="gitlab-shell"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{type="gitlab-shell"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="gitlab-shell"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: gitlab-shell Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.

    "period", "1h", "", ""

  or

    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="grpc_requests",type="gitlab-shell"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="grpc_requests",type="gitlab-shell"})))),

panels.title: grpc_requests SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

A proxy measurement of the number of GRPC SSH service requests made to Gitaly and Praefect.

Since we are unable to measure gitlab-shell directly at present, this is the best substitute we can provide.



### Observability Tools
panels.title: Details
Estimated p95 grpc_requests Latency - per node
Apdex attribution for grpc_requests Latency - per node

panels.description:
Kubernetes containers are allocated a share of CPU. When this is exhausted, the container may be thottled.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(type, pod, container) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      sum by (type, pod, container) (
        rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:labeled{container!="", container!="POD", type="gitlab-shell"}[5m])
      )
      /
      sum by(type, pod, container) (
        container_spec_cpu_quota:labeled{container!="", container!="POD", type="gitlab-shell"}
        /
        container_spec_cpu_period:labeled{container!="", container!="POD", type="gitlab-shell"}
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: kube_container_cpu component saturation: Kube Container CPU Utilization

panels.description:
Records the total memory utilization for containers for this service, as a percentage of
the memory limit as configured through Kubernetes.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(type) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      container_memory_working_set_bytes:labeled{container!="", container!="POD", type="gitlab-shell"}
      /
      (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes:labeled{container!="", container!="POD", type="gitlab-shell"} > 0)
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: kube_container_memory component saturation: Kube Container Memory Utilization

panels.content: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è and [Grafonnet](https://github.com/grafana/grafonnet-lib). [Contribute to this dashboard on GitLab.com](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/blob/master/dashboards)
